description: Generalized weak orders on n points.
references: I. P. Goulden and D. M. Jackson, Combinatorial Enumeration, John Wiley and Sons, N.Y., 1983.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
C. G. Wagner, Enumeration of generalized weak orders. Arch. Math. (Basel) 39 (1982), no. 2, 147-152.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..80
mathematica: max = 14; f[x_] := 1/(1 - Sum[(2^(i*(i+1)/2)*x^i)/i!, {i, 1, max}]); Drop[ CoefficientList[ Series[f[x], {x, 0, max}], x]*Range[0, max]!, 1] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Oct 21 2011, after g.f. *)
crossrefs: Cf. A004122, A004123, A000670 (asymmetric generalized weak orders on n points).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Formula and more terms from _Vladeta Jovovic_, Mar 27 2001
